vedic_astrology.description: In Vedic Astrology, the birth chart (horoscope) is divided into 12 houses, each representing a specific aspect of life. Every house has a ruling planet (planetary lord) that influences how that area behaves in an individual's chart.

houses.meaning: Represents self, personality, physical appearance, confidence, and overall life approach.
houses.influence: A strong first house indicates vitality, leadership, and a proactive mindset.

recommended_gemstone.name: Red Coral
recommended_gemstone.effects: Enhances physical energy, courage, determination, and focus.

houses.meaning: Governs wealth, family, possessions, and speech.
houses.influence: A strong Venus brings comfort, refined communication, and stability in family life.

recommended_gemstone.name: Diamond or Opal
recommended_gemstone.effects: Supports emotional balance, financial growth, and harmony in relationships.

houses.meaning: Represents courage, communication, siblings, and adaptability.
houses.influence: A well-placed Mercury enhances intellect, creativity, and quick thinking.

recommended_gemstone.name: Emerald (Panna)
recommended_gemstone.effects: Sharpens logic, improves concentration, and enhances verbal ability.

houses.meaning: Relates to home, emotions, mother, and domestic happiness.
houses.influence: A strong Moon provides emotional stability, comfort, and strong maternal bonds.

recommended_gemstone.name: Pearl (Moti)
recommended_gemstone.effects: Calms emotions and promotes mental peace and family harmony.

houses.meaning: Represents creativity, intelligence, romance, and children.
houses.influence: A strong Sun brings leadership, confidence, and recognition.

recommended_gemstone.name: Ruby
recommended_gemstone.effects: Boosts self-esteem, leadership, and public success.

houses.meaning: Governs health, service, discipline, and handling obstacles.
houses.influence: A balanced Mercury aids problem-solving and stress management.

recommended_gemstone.name: Emerald (Panna)
recommended_gemstone.effects: Supports clarity, organization, and improved health.

houses.meaning: Represents partnerships, marriage, and long-term relationships.
houses.influence: A strong Venus enhances harmony and mutual respect in relationships.

recommended_gemstone.name: Opal or Diamond
recommended_gemstone.effects: Attracts positive relationships and strengthens emotional bonds.

houses.meaning: Rules transformation, longevity, hidden matters, and sudden events.
houses.influence: Brings depth, mystery, and resilience through transformation.

recommended_gemstone.name: Red Coral or Cat’s Eye
recommended_gemstone.effects: Provides protection, spiritual grounding, and emotional resilience.

houses.note: Gemstones for this house should only be worn under expert supervision.

houses.meaning: Represents luck, spirituality, higher learning, and long-distance travel.
houses.influence: A strong Jupiter brings wisdom, faith, and guidance from teachers or elders.

recommended_gemstone.name: Yellow Sapphire (Pukhraj)
recommended_gemstone.effects: Promotes wisdom, spiritual clarity, and success in education or career.

houses.meaning: Governs career, reputation, authority, and public image.
houses.influence: A strong Saturn gives discipline, slow but steady growth, and respect.

recommended_gemstone.name: Blue Sapphire (Neelam)
recommended_gemstone.effects: Brings focus, patience, and professional stability.

houses.meaning: Represents gains, friendships, and fulfillment of desires.
houses.influence: A balanced Saturn ensures consistent progress and reliable support network.

recommended_gemstone.name: Blue Sapphire (Neelam)
recommended_gemstone.effects: Enhances steady financial growth and long-term achievements.

houses.meaning: Represents losses, isolation, spirituality, foreign travel, and liberation.
houses.influence: Brings spiritual awakening, detachment, and transcendence of material desires.

recommended_gemstone.name: Yellow Sapphire or Cat’s Eye
recommended_gemstone.effects: Enhances intuition, spiritual depth, and peaceful detachment.

planets.name: Sun
planets.description: Stands for energy and the essence of a person's identity.
planets.influence: Represents life force, ego, and willpower.

gemstone.name: Ruby
gemstone.effects: Enhances confidence, vitality, and leadership abilities.

planets.name: Moon
planets.description: Reflects emotions, inner world, and mental stability.

gemstone.name: Pearl (Moti)
gemstone.effects: Balances emotions, calms the mind, and fosters inner peace.

planets.name: Mercury
planets.description: Governs intellect, communication, and analytical thinking.

gemstone.name: Emerald (Panna)
gemstone.effects: Improves memory, speech clarity, and decision-making skills.

planets.name: Venus
planets.description: Planet of beauty, love, luxury, and relationships.

gemstone.name: Diamond or Opal
gemstone.effects: Brings harmony and enhances love and luxury.

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.description: Planet of expansion, wisdom, and higher learning.

gemstone.name: Yellow Sapphire (Pukhraj)
gemstone.effects: Increases wisdom, prosperity, and spiritual insight.

planets.name: Saturn
planets.description: Planet of discipline, responsibility, and karma.

gemstone.name: Blue Sapphire (Neelam)
gemstone.effects: Brings stability, focus, and protection from obstacles.

planets.name: Rahu
planets.description: Represents worldly desires, ambitions, and illusions.
planets.influence: Amplifies material pursuits and unconventional goals.

gemstone.name: Hessonite Garnet (Gomed)
gemstone.effects: Balances ambition, reduces confusion, and aids focus.

gemstone.name: Cat’s Eye (Lehsunia)
gemstone.effects: Promotes spiritual insight and protection from negativity.
